snippet: - Zlatan Ibrahimovic produced a brilliant finish two minutes from time to earn Manchester United a 2-1 Premier League win at Crystal Palace on Wednesday....

headline.main: Ibrahimovic Late Strike Seals Man United Win Over Palace
headline.print_headline: Ibrahimovic Late Strike Seals Man United Win Over Palace

lead_paragraph: - Zlatan Ibrahimovic produced a brilliant finish two minutes from time to earn Manchester United a 2-1 Premier League win at Crystal Palace on Wednesday.

snippet: Stoke City have signed striker Wilfried Bony from Manchester City on a season-long loan, the Premier League clubs announced on Wednesday....

headline.main: Stoke Sign Bony on Loan From Man City
headline.print_headline: Stoke Sign Bony on Loan From Man City

lead_paragraph: Stoke City have signed striker Wilfried Bony from Manchester City on a season-long loan, the Premier League clubs announced on Wednesday.

snippet: Newcastle United have signed striker Seydou Doumbia on loan from AS Roma subject to the player receiving a visa, the Premier League club said on their website on Monday (www.nufc.co.uk)....

headline.main: Roma Striker Doumbia Joins Newcastle on Loan
headline.print_headline: Roma Striker Doumbia Joins Newcastle on Loan

lead_paragraph: Newcastle United have signed striker Seydou Doumbia on loan from AS Roma subject to the player receiving a visa, the Premier League club said on their website on Monday (www.nufc.co.uk).

snippet: West Ham United have signed left-back Arthur Masuaku from Olympiakos Piraeus on a four-year contract, the Premier League side confirmed on Monday....
lead_paragraph: West Ham United have signed left-back Arthur Masuaku from Olympiakos Piraeus on a four-year contract, the Premier League side confirmed on Monday.

snippet: Christian Benteke and Wilfried Zaha brought relief to Crystal Palace manager Alan Pardew as their goals earned the struggling Londoners their first Premier League win of the season 2-1 at Middlesbrough on Saturday....

headline.main: Benteke and Zaha Earn the Spoils for Palace
headline.print_headline: Benteke and Zaha Earn the Spoils for Palace

lead_paragraph: Christian Benteke and Wilfried Zaha brought relief to Crystal Palace manager Alan Pardew as their goals earned the struggling Londoners their first Premier League win of the season 2-1 at Middlesbrough on Saturday.

snippet: Leicester City have reached agreement with French club Nice to sign midfielder Nampalys Mendy, the Premier League champions said on Sunday....

headline.main: Leicester Agree to Sign Midfielder Mendy
headline.print_headline: Leicester Agree to Sign Midfielder Mendy

lead_paragraph: Leicester City have reached agreement with French club Nice to sign midfielder Nampalys Mendy, the Premier League champions said on Sunday.

snippet: Newcastle United are on the verge of relegation from the Premier League after failing to do what most teams in the Premier League have found easy this season -- win at Villa Park....

headline.main: Newcastle on Brink After Failing to Beat Villa
headline.print_headline: Newcastle on Brink After Failing to Beat Villa

lead_paragraph: Newcastle United are on the verge of relegation from the Premier League after failing to do what most teams in the Premier League have found easy this season -- win at Villa Park.

snippet: Manchester City striker Sergio Aguero has been charged with violent conduct over an incident involving West Ham United defender Winston Reid, the FA said in a statement on Tuesday....

headline.main: City Striker Aguero Charged by FA With Violent Conduct
headline.print_headline: City Striker Aguero Charged by FA With Violent Conduct

lead_paragraph: Manchester City striker Sergio Aguero has been charged with violent conduct over an incident involving West Ham United defender Winston Reid, the FA said in a statement on Tuesday.

snippet: Stoke City manager Mark Hughes has been fined 8,000 pounds ($10,400) after he accepted a misconduct charge in relation to an incident during their 4-0 Premier League loss to Tottenham Hotspur, the English FA said on Monday....

headline.main: Stoke Manager Hughes Fined by FA for Misconduct
headline.print_headline: Stoke Manager Hughes Fined by FA for Misconduct

lead_paragraph: Stoke City manager Mark Hughes has been fined 8,000 pounds ($10,400) after he accepted a misconduct charge in relation to an incident during their 4-0 Premier League loss to Tottenham Hotspur, the English FA said on Monday.

snippet: Liverpool have the strength in depth to cope with Sadio Mane's absence during next month's African Nations Cup, the Senegal striker has said....

headline.main: Liverpool Depth Will Compensate for Nations Cup Absence-Mane
headline.print_headline: Liverpool Depth Will Compensate for Nations Cup Absence-Mane

lead_paragraph: Liverpool have the strength in depth to cope with Sadio Mane's absence during next month's African Nations Cup, the Senegal striker has said.
